recentChanges:
The NBA Season is back! NBA LIVE Mobile brings you all new fresh content to play along with.

-New gameplay improvements including enhanced rebounding, blocking and AI shooting tendencies.

-Play to showcase your talent with new campaigns and earn exclusive rewards with an all-new LIVE PASS

-Build up your team on the way to the NBA Playoffs

-Improved performance and stability
comments: Keep improving. This game needs a "heat check." If you make 3 shots with the same player, the player should catch fire and gain a boost or special ability. Or make 3 defensive plays and catch fire on defense. I think the this will give a boost. Better rewards for getting to the playoffs and winning the finals. When you win the finals and start a new season and you don't get a ring, what's the point? Give more incentives. Make a kobe bryant leaderboard to tracks how many rings you get!

This is a great game. I would reccomend this game for any NBA fan. The controls are very smooth and are easy. The graphics are great, but they don't look exactly right. I like that you can choose your own franchise. The packs that are in the store are pretty expensive, but what you get in them is worth it. There are old players, as well as some new ones. Some old ones are Allen Iverson and Ray Allen. Some active ones are LeBron James, Steph Curry, and James Harden.

For the love of God fix the damn game crashes... it just doesn't stop. I dont know what happened on the last update but damn guys. The game keeps crashing and logging me off. I cant watch the ads to earn beef because they either won't play or they get stuck and im left with a black screen then have to close the app and start it over to try again. I love this game, i play it constantly, but damn, yall have to fix this, it is beyond annoying and prevents me from building my teams.

Requested a refund because of an unauthorized purchase, and EA refused to send a refund. They always took a long time to respond to emails, and often just sent the same message back, which was very little help. They also kept telling me I had to ask Google for a refund, but then Google sent me back to EA. It was like the 2 of them were playing ping pong and I was the ball, just going back and forth. Would not reccomend playing this game or spending any money whatsoever.

While the graphics and gameplay is fun, to get anywhere real you need to pay a lot of money, as are all typical EA games. But there are some conection problems and I can only fathom about telling you how many half court shots the opposing AI has made in crucial buzzer beater situations. Imagine about an hour of grinding just wasted because of that. Multiple times. Other then that, I suppose it's okay.

title: English Dictionary - Offline
description:
The free offline English dictionary application explains the meaning of English words! Definitions are based on English Wiktionary. Fast search, easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets.
Ready to go: it works offline without any further file to download!

Features
‚ô¶ More than 356000 english definitions and large number of inflected forms
‚ô¶ You can leaf through words using your finger (swipe right and left)
‚ô¶ Manage your bookmarks, personal notes and search history
‚ô¶ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of single unknown letter. The symbol * can be used in place of any group of letters. The fullstop symbol . can be used to mark the end of a word.
‚ô¶ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words
‚ô¶ Share word definition using other apps, like gmail or whatsapp
‚ô¶ Compatible with Moon+ Reader, FBReader and other applications via share button
‚ô¶ Backup&restore configuration, personal notes and bookmarks on local memory, Google Drive, Dropbox and Box clouds (available only if you have installed these applications on your device)
‚ô¶ Camera search via OCR Plugin, available only on devices with back camera. (Settings->Floating Action Button->Camera). The OCR Plugin has to be downloaded from Google Play.

Fuzzy search
‚ô¶ To search words with prefix, e.g. starting with 'moon', please write moon* and the dropdown list will show the words starting with 'moon'
‚ô¶ To search words with suffix, e.g. ending with 'moon', please write *moon. and the dropdown list will show the words ending with 'moon'
‚ô¶ To search words containing a word, e.g. 'moon', just write *moon* and the dropdown list will show the words containing 'moon'

Your settings
‚ô¶ Black and white themes with user defined text colors (press menu-->select Settings-->click on Theme)
‚ô¶ Optional Floating Action Button (FAB) supporting one of the following actions: Search, History, Favorites, Random search and Share option; Optional shake action with similar actions.
‚ô¶ Persistent Search option to get automatic keyboard at startup
‚ô¶ Text to speech options, including selection of British or American accent (press menu-->select Settings-->click on Text to Speech-->select Language)
‚ô¶ Number of items in history
‚ô¶ Customisable font size and line spacing, default screen orientation
‚ô¶ Start up option: home page, most recent word, random word or word of the day

Questions
‚ô¶ No voice output? Please follow instructions here: http://goo.gl/axXwR
Note: word pronunciation works only if voice data have been installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine). 
‚ô¶ British word pronunciation not working? Please follow instructions here: https://cutt.ly/beMDCbR

‚ô¶ Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V
‚ô¶ Keep safe your bookmarks and notes, please read: https://goo.gl/d1LCVc
‚ô¶ Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C
‚ô¶ Download also the other livio offline dictionaries available in Google Play for a broader and unique experience

In case Moon+ Reader does not list my dictionary: open pop-up "Customize dictionary" and select "Open dictionary directly when Long-Tap on a word"

‚ö† An offline dictionary needs memory. In case your device has low memory, please consider to use the online dictionary: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=livio.dictionary

Information for application developers:
‚úî This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android

Permissions
This application requires the following permissions:
‚ô¢ INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of unknown words
‚ô¢ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks

recentChanges: ‚ô¶ Enhanced to support Android 11
comments: The application is just perfect with a humongous range of definitions. I've been using it for years now but since last 6-8 months I am unable to use the pronunciation feature. Seems to have been botched. It hasn't been rectified despite umpteen updates. I request the developer to look into it. UPDATE : the function is back and as unflinching as ever. Thanks a lot for your support. 5 stars!

I genuinely love this app. One feature I wish this app would have tho is similar to that of Quick Dictionary's, like even when I'm on another app or reader and I click or copy a word, it instantly shows meanings and other infos of that word without actually leaving the reader/app. It's basically like a pop-up thing. That feature would make reading much more easier. Other than that, this app is perfect. I have other dictio apps, but I just can't let go of this one. Thank you so much!

This is the best dictionary app to use as it does not need the internet, has current words and slangs along with abbreviations defined, and also has an audio to help pronounce the word correctly. Although, there are some words not having much synonyms to allow a person to find alternative words when writing a paper of any sort. But all in all, this is a far better dictionary app

I've been using it for quiet a while with my pocketbook reader and it was perfect but since the latest update I'm unable to go directly to the searched word from the reader ( as it used to be ) but it points to the start page of the dictionary. This problem is commun to both English and French dictionaries. Thanks

Best dictionary I have ever used. It is offline and has a comprehensive description on every word's meaning. My favourite is the persistent search function and recommendation bar. It even has scientific words and many more which is very applaudable. I really recommend this application for all because I trust it WILL make you understand every word's meaning. Five stars to you, English Dictionary!

title: FastVid: Video Downloader for Facebook
description:
Video Downloader for Facebook is the easiest Video Downloader app designed specifically to help you download videos from Facebook and save them using different methods, it allows you to download videos from Facebook and save them to your device using the video link/URL without login OR by sharing the video from Facebook to the "Video Downloader for Facebook" app OR by browsing your account and clicking on the videos you want to download and save on your device.


Video Downloader for Facebook allows you to browse your Facebook account using a secure built-in browser that protects your privacy and enables you to browse through the videos you want to save on your device so that you can watch or share them later from your gallery with your friends via different apps.


New: Now you can save videos from Facebook to your gallery using the video link/URL, just copy/paste the video link/URL and start downloading the video without login, no login required!


How to use:


Method 1 (Download videos from Facebook using the built-in browser):

1. Click on Browse Facebook.

2. Login and browse your wall.

3. Click the video you want to download.

4. Click on Download to save to your device.


Method 2 (Download videos from Facebook using the video link/URL without login):

1- Copy video link/URL.
2- Paste inside app.
3- Click on install.


Method 3 (Download videos from Facebook by sharing the video to our app):

1- Share the video from the Facebook app.
2- Choose "Video Downloader for Facebook"


Install Video Downloader for Facebook and start downloading videos from Facebook now!

Important Notes:

- This app is NOT affiliated with or endorsed by the Facebook official network.

- Any unauthorized re-uploading or downloading of contents and/or violations of Intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user.

- This app is intended to be used by people aged 13+

- This app can download videos without login

title: How to Stop Diarrhea Fast
description:
Diarrhea is a common type of gastrointestinal upset or infection. It causes frequent and excessive discharging of the bowels in the form of abnormally watery stools and stomach pains. If you or one of your children has recently developed diarrhea, the first question you‚Äôre likely asking is ‚ÄúCan you tell me how to stop diarrhea fast?‚Äù

The good news is there are several steps you can take to naturally treat both types of diarrhea. Below you‚Äôll learn about steps you can take to thicken your stool, rehydrate and overcome symptoms of diarrhea.

I bought the BTS membership February 1, 2020 and still haven't gotten my membership box to this day. I understand with covid there is a delay but I work for the postal service and its not that big of a delay anymore from overseas. No updated emails about delays, no communication. Hard to purchase certain shows too. Another 2 1/2 months later still nothing.

i purchased army membership in april 2020 but still not get my army membership kit..also everything i try to purchase (includes merch),there is a message showing"cannot be shipped ro India"..i mean its so frustrating as now international flights also started but they are always showing this that they can't ship in india anything

Overall a good app. It would be nice if completed orders listed an estimated shipping date!! Most items are presale with shipping dates months away & it's hard to keep track when you have multiple orders! I completely understand that shipment dates are subject to change but when there are multiple rounds of presales you can't even check the product listing for the right shipping information.

title: Ramuan Herbal Infeksi Lambung Tradisional Mujarab
description:
Infeksi pada lambung adalah sebuah kondisi di mana lapisan lambung
mengalami peradangan dan ini biasanya terjadi karena mikroorganisme
bernama bakteri /Helycobacter pylori/. Istilah lain untuk menyebut
infeksi lambung adalah gastritis yang kalau dibiarkan dalam waktu lama
akan memicu kerusakan lapisan lambung. Akhirnya akan terbentuk yang
namanya tukak lambung atau luka pada lambung, perdarahan dan perforasi atau kebocoran lambung.

Dapatkan Aplikasi Lainnya Dari 'Kumpulan Ramuan Herbal'
Dapat Dibaca Tanpa Koneksi Internet

Download Sekarang Gratis Dan Dapat Dibaca Secara Offline
Semoga Bermanfaat Bagi Kesehatan Anda.

Ampuh dan Tanpa Efek Samping

comments: The app is good, I can communicate with other fans and my idols but the main problem is notifications üò∂I don't know when my idol post something or comment on someone's post. Normally everyone gets notifications but I don't at all. Secondly the translation; it's very bad. It misinterprets what people post a lot like all the time. So I don't know exactly what they said and I don't understand üòê cause of the translator. Please fix these issues üôÇ

This app is really good. It's a great source to communicate with our favorite idols and our idols can also share their moments with us. I will give this app 5 stars but the problem is translation . The translations are weird. Sometimes it makes zero sense. Which is a problem for the international fans as most of them don't speak Korean. So, in my humble opinion they should work a little more to update the translation system.

Sadly this app keeps getting worse by the day. I cannot comment on anything. Nothing will translate because the servers are always busy. I continually get an network connection error, even though I am practically sitting next to my modem. I am also having issues watching items I have purchased without receiving an error message and the video will not play. These are just some of the many issues myself and others are dealing with. Please fix this.

Perfect app for BTS followers! A platform which connects BTS and army together. It allows you to interact with your idols as well as other fans. The only problem I face is of the translator. Some translations get wrong and changes the entire meaning. Apart from the translator, this app is amazing. Let the tie get more stronger with weverse.

I really like this app. There's one feature that I'd like it to have and that is, an option to delete selective notifications. For example, if I post something then I would obviously like to know who cheered or commented on my post. But after sometime, it becomes irrelevant. So I'd want to be able to select the notifs that I don't want and delete them. This way, I can get rid of the unwanted notifs and can keep in updated with the artist posts and their new comeback announcements etc.

title: PewDiePie's Tuber Simulator
description:
Follow in the footsteps of one of the biggest internet stars, PewDiePie, by creating your very own pocket Tuber in PewDiePie's Tuber Simulator! Will you become the biggest, baddest Tuber ever in no time and kick PewDiePie out of his own throne? 

Find out in this 2.5D isometric retro styled game!

comments: It's honestly addictive once you get the hang of it, which doesn't take long! And so far it's easy to level up and progress in the game unlike other games like this. Also literally no ads, unless you choose to watch an ad to speed up the already fast tasks! So I have nothing bad to say about it! Nice job Pewds!

This is from when i first played it. It is great and fun and i love it, but had to uninstall it bcs of problems with my storage. Now that i fixed my storage i reinstalled it but to my suprise i cant play. Im stuck im the loading screen where it has the logo of the game and the colorful background. If u can help me plz do

This game is actually very well made. The way they inserted mini games to keep you interested while you wait or if you wanna do something different. And the best part is its not the "pay to win" kind of mobile game with all the pop-up ads on top of it. You can just grind your way to the top or you can take the easier way around if you have money to spend. Absolutely love this game. No wonder it's still relevant üòÅüòâ

Ive had this app for 3 years now and let me just say: phoenomenal. You'd really think it would get boring after playing for awhile, but there are mechanisms set in place that make it just alot of fun. I absolutely recomend to anyone who wants to have a good time. The pixel art is also just incredible!

I used to love this game, but I call it bs now because it crashes too often or worse, it makes my phone too lagged that it forces me to hard reset my phone most of the time I attempt to log in to this game. I've been experiencing the same problem since February(as far as I can remember) but still, there's no improvement at all. It is so frustrating that I can play call of duty on my phone smoothly, but not tuber when supposedly, it is COD thay requires a better phone specs so WHY?!!!!

title: Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word)
description:
Alhamdulillah. Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word) is a Quran study tool for all. It provides Verse by Verse Audio Playback with repeat functions, Tafsir Ibn Kathir, Color Coded Tajweed, Word by Word Analysis and Translations, Index of Quran, Note Taking & Custom Bookmarks with Sync, Powerful Search, Several Translations & Tafsirs in Various Languages, Multiple Themes and Fonts and much more.

You can Enjoy:
Several Translations & Tafsirs:
‚óè 70+ Translations & Tafsirs with 35+ Languages: Bengali, Chinese, English, French, Hindi, German, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Urdu and many more
‚óè Verse Indexed Tafsir Ibn Kathir in English with Embedded Arabic, Taqiuddin Hilali commentary
‚óè 8 Arabic Tafsirs (including Tafseer Ibn Kathir, Tafseer Tabari etc.)
‚óè Different Quran Translations & Tafsirs viewable simultaneously

Word by word Analysis & Translations:
‚óè Word by Word Translation in English, Indonesian, Bangla, German, Turkish based on Quran
‚óè Word by Word Rendering, Root / Lemma Information, Word Occurrences, Details and Verb Forms

Bookmarks & Notes:
‚óè Bookmarks / Favorites separated into User Made Categories
‚óè Mark Verses as Last Read using Single Bookmark Feature, and keep track of Khatmah
‚óè Take Notes for Each Ayah
‚óè Bookmarks / Notes Sync & Import / Export feature to share across devices

Search & Quran Index:
‚óè Powerful Full-Text Search Engine with Highlights
‚óè Quran Index

Quran Majeed Audio mp3:
‚óè Audio mp3 full Quran Majeed 30 Juz or 114 Surah without limitations
‚óè Listen to several recitations by 30+ Reciters (downloadable for offline use)
‚óè Reciter Options: Sheikh Mishary Al Afasy, Sheikh Husary (Muallim), Shaykh Ayman Suwaid, Sheikh Abdur Rahman As-Sudais, Shaykh Abdul Basit Mujawwad and many other Qaris
‚óè English and Urdu translation audio
‚óè Robust Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorization / Quran Hifz

Various Customization Options, Tajweed & Others:
‚óè Reading with Uthmani or IndoPak script style
‚óè Read Quran in Mushaf Mode
‚óè Read Tafsirs in Tafsir View
‚óè Color Coded Tajweed with the same color implementation as iQuran (For Android kitkat & up)
‚óè Various Fonts, Pinch Zoom feature and Multiple Themes including Night Mode
‚óè Autoscroll feature
‚óè Copy & Share the verses

Localization:
‚óè Quran App User Interface localized in 10+ Languages: Arabic, English, Bangla, German, French, Bahasa Indonesia / Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Turkish, Urdu and more

‚óè All feature supports offline (Quran offline)
‚óè And next features that are in development

Share and Recommend this Beautiful Quran app for Android to your friends and family. May Allah bless us in this world and hereafter.
"Whoever calls people to right guidance will have a reward like that of those who follow him..." - Sahih Muslim, Hadith 2674

comments: MashahAllah, this is a great app with everything in one place. I absolutely love the way they have put the exact meaning of each word underneath, at last I am beginning to learn the words in Arabic which is benefitting me so much. I haven't figured out how to use audio yet which I am sure will enhance my experience. I highly recommend this app for non-Arabic speakers and those, like me, who are reverts to Islam. There is so much knowledge to be gained from one app. Well done

Hi I like the new interface. Got 2 suggestion: 1) Make it able to read by pages as well. After salah I'd read 2 pages. Say in surah alBaqarah I want to read page 10 and 11. Without this feature I have to key-in verse 62 to 76 which is cumbersome. 2) Allow us to donate thru upgrade with fixed price. Reason is I dont use credit card. Google play has option where it allows me to pay by crediting it to my telco monthly bill. Make free then remind the user to upgrade (donating); be creative in this.

The apps search functionality needs improvement. Example: I searched using your translation, "the most" for aqwamun as in Sura 17, al isra Search comes with 0 found. Explain how to use the search function most effectively. Also, Search function doesn't work if I use the Quranic word. Example: I searched using al Qur'an but it came back saying 0 found. This app has many nice features. I hope you will continue to improve it by making the search functionality more effective and efficient.

Definitely the BEST Qur'an app. It has everything that you need, it actually shocked me how good the app is! Recommended if you want to read and memorize The Qur'an. The features I like most are the word-by-word translation and the vast variety of murrotal that we can play ayah-by-ayah. I really like this app, thanks for creating this. üòä

Assalamualaikum, Please add a function that we can hear Arabic (Al Afasy) and English translation (with gap) at the same time. I loved this app so much. Many of Quran app have this function to hear 2 audio at the same time. If you create a function that one for Arabic recitation and another one for translation recitation in many language or at least English translation then we will be very happy only for the sake of Allah. You guys updated this app frequently i love this if you add this functio

title: Colon Cancer Screening/Education App
description:
This educational application allows users to check their symptoms for any red flags symptoms of colorectal cancer and provides basic patient information about bowel cancer.

Developed by Emmett Brennan and Professor Dermot Hehir in conjunction with the Department of Surgery, Midlands Regional Hospital Tullamore and with THe graduate entry medical School at the University of Limerick Ireland.

title: Flipboard - Latest News, Top Stories & Lifestyle
description:
Discover quality content for all your interests - from personalized news, entertainment, tech and sports articles to trending lifestyle magazines. We'll deliver the latest headlines, events, and entertainment stories to save you time, keep you informed and make sure you're always up-to-date with what's happening.

NEW: Flipboard TV - watch video from hundreds of publishers, TV stations and independent producers for free. Visit the Explore tab to select from 20 curated video channels for news, politics, travel, lifestyle, celebrity, sports and more.

Trust our unique combination of professional editors and smart algorithms to customize and deliver must-read stories and undiscovered gems. Get the full perspective on the latest news - and share what you find. Our editors blend expert voices and curated sources, and even recommended stories they know you'll like, so you can sit back and flip through what matters most to you. 

You can even customize your personalized newsstand: pick your passions and create a Smart Magazine for each topic feed. Are you interested in world news, events or tech developments? Want to read articles from national newspapers, discover sports podcasts, and skim the latest news? Looking to seize the zeitgeist from trending lifestyle stories? Flipboard has you covered. 

Plus, you can create personal magazines: find articles you want to read later or you want to share, and use the "+" to flip them into your own magazines. 

MAKE THE BEST USE OF YOUR TIME ON FLIPBOARD:

‚Ä¢ Discover the latest news from The New York Times, National Geographic, Vanity Fair, and thousands more top newspapers and magazines, local, national or from around the world

‚Ä¢ Create and customize your Smart Magazines: bundle together sources, people and even hashtags to get access to truly personalized news

‚Ä¢ Customize your home feed: collate up to 9 of your favorite Smart Magazines together for quick access to the features you love

‚Ä¢ Read The Daily Edition: keep up with the latest headlines and trending events in our daily roundup of important stories and personalized news articles

‚Ä¢ Curate your perspective: collect stories around specific themes and add them to personal magazines

TOP PUBLISHERS ON FLIPBOARD:

- News & Politics: discover the latest headlines in national and world news, with newspapers and publications like The New York Times, CNN, Politico, Axios
- Tech & Science: read the latest tech news with TechCrunch, trending science stories with Wired, and more
- Business & Entrepreneurship: get personalized news relevant to your interests from The Wall Street Journal, Bloomberg, Forbes
- Sports: national pastimes or world news, never miss key sporting events with ESPN, CBS Sports
- Entertainment: get world news, even for celebrities and entertainment with People, Rolling Stone, Variety
- Lifestyle & Wellness: explore emerging lifestyle trends with Brit + Co., Self, Women's Health
- Food & Cooking: get some serious food inspiration from Bon Appetit, Food & Wine, Serious Eats
- Travel: feed your wanderlust with National Geographic, Travel + Leisure, Lonely Planet
- Home & Gardening: dream up your ideal home ELLE DECOR, House Beautiful
- Style: avant-garde or corporate with an edge... get sartorial inspiration from Vogue, Refinery29, W Magazine, GQ

KEEP UP WITH FLIPBOARD:

For product updates and the latest headlines from our blog, including tips on how to use Flipboard and interviews with actors, writers, musicians, and more. Follow us on:
www.twitter.com/@flipboard
www.facebook.com/Flipboard
https://www.linkedin.com/company/flipboard-inc-

For videos on how to use Flipboard, visit https://about.flipboard.com/tutorials/

Need help using the Flipboard app? Browse our help articles by opening Settings then Help & Feedback. Or, click the contact button at flip.it/help

summary: Discover trending stories and the latest world news with a personalized feed
recentChanges:
- Now with Flipboard TV: watch video from hundreds of publishers, TV stations and independent producers for free. Visit the Explore tab to select from 20 curated video channels for news, politics, travel, lifestyle, celebrity, sports and more.

- Follow wildfires and weather affecting major metros using the expanded Local Cities coverage in the Explore tab.

- Expanded election coverage with new publishers in the Vote2020 collection.
comments: Nice interface. Though each type of device has a different user experience, (iOS, Android, MacOS), a little weird but each is still very good. I like the ability to add and subtract areas if interest. They mark ads/sponsored posts pretty well. Pretty speedy on all devices, even somewhat older ones. Overall a nice news agragator.

I've been using flipboard for years. Now like 80% of the content is videos. And NONE of those videos actually play. It's so weird. They have some new video set up, every time I click on a video, it doesn't play. Just black screen. Click on it, it goes to another black screen. So, two major problems rendering this app useless: 1. Nearly all news is now in the form of videos. I don't want videos. I want to read, and 2. Those videos don't even work. How do you not beta test this, Flipboard??

If I open a page on source like golf or mma or something like that, I get articles that cover something else entirely. I'm really annoyed that I spend more time reporting articles that are not on topic and I don't know why this hasn't changed in years of reporting these articles... Please do something about this.

Been using flipboard for quite some time since you can customize what news you see or just flip through all news. Biggest down side is tbe comment section is really subpar and broken up into different sections. Dont even bother commenting if you see 100 plus comments because your comment is lost at the bottom. Other than that is a nice app to see any news you want.

Can't share URL if you click a link inside an article. Steps to repro: 1. Tap into an article 2. Tap any link on the page that goes to a different site 3. Observe the top toolbar shrinks from several items to 2 items. 4. Tap the share button in that toolbar 5. Pick literally anything on share sheet. 6. See "Couldn't Share item" error every time. If you fix this bug lmk and I'll revise my review! Update: Flipboard denied this obvious, reproducible bug. Smh. Bug does not happen on ios.

title: Knock'em All
description:
The most impressive game of 2020 so far! 
Jump from building to building and shoot the dummies to destabilize them and make them fall from the top!

The best players manage to chain sections together by stepping on them in just a few seconds. 

Simple and intuitive controls and addictive gameplay mechanics.
descriptionHTML:
The most impressive game of 2020 so far!
Jump from building to building and shoot the dummies to destabilize them and make them fall from the top!

The best players manage to chain sections together by stepping on them in just a few seconds.

Simple and intuitive controls and addictive gameplay mechanics.
summary: Make everything falls apart!
recentChanges: Overall optimization.
comments: Ridiculously easy. Limited scenarios. Once guns are maxed out, the challenge is gone. It's a little fun up to level 100-150, but then it's just repetitive. Developers need to increase the strength of the dummies to make them more difficult to kill, or more aggressive. Will reconsider playing if developers actually develop a progressive level of difficulty. Not going to be a money maker as I won't pay for the different balls and boosts.

I dont understand it, I delete this game because it starts to seem repetitious (if I spelled that right), and next thing you know Im downloading it all over again. About 8 times now. Got up to level 1000. Devel. team IMO you need more updates like new characters and locations. The one dude in the "ball machine" is corny tho". Just my op. Overall its a good game that has the possibility of being great. You guys are golden.

No BS. Other games claim to be addictive. Literally paid the 5bucks... I just completed Lvl 3500 with no intention of stopping ü§£ its true. This is literally a splatter game with no challenge but headshots are so satisfying. It would be nice if it were a bit beefier at higher levls but so what? Its a phone app. I do my serious gaming on XBox. This is a Time "Chiller".

It's one of the most funniest games I've ever seen, I'm level 150 at my first day üòÇ The only thing that is not good, is the variety of robots. It only has 3 kinds of robots and I like if it would have more kinds of robots. Please add more üëå

Well I think that this game is fab. I'm now on level 70. I like the upgraded guns. I like how the men get blown away or you blow their heads off ü§£. Different situations. Different guns and different robots. It's just run, easy and I like it.

title: Malwarebytes Security: Virus Cleaner, Anti-Malware
description:
Malwarebytes Security: Virus Cleaner, Anti-Malware.

Block scams and protect your privacy. Our powerful app scans for viruses and malware, and aggressively detects ransomware, PUPs, and phishing scams.

Your Malwarebytes for Android or Malwarebytes for Chromebook free download comes with a 30-day trial of the Premium version. When the 30-day trial is ended, Malwarebytes will only detect and clean, but not prevent, infections. It‚Äôs ad-free, forever.

Note: Malwarebytes for Chromebook is an Android app engineered specifically to protect your Chromebook. Google Play automatically detects if you are viewing this page on an Android device or a Chromebook, and will install the appropriate Malwarebytes product.

Benefits
Premium ($1.49 per month, or $11.99 per year)
‚Ä¢	Detects ransomware before it can lock your device
Real-time protection shields your device from infection. With mobile malware threats on the rise, advanced technologies deal with dangerous newcomers like ransomware before they can become a problem. 
‚Ä¢	Safer browsing experience
Scans for phishing URLs when using the Chrome browser and alerts you when any are detected to ensure you have a safer experience while surfing the web. Only available for phones and tablets
For Chromebook, we recommend adding our free Chrome extension for faster page loading and protection against risky sites, such as phishing and tech support scams.
Free download on Chrome Web Store

Free (the Premium version also includes these benefits)
‚Ä¢	Conducts privacy audit for all apps
Identifies the access privileges of every app on your Android device so you know exactly what information you're sharing. Keep tabs on which apps can track your location, monitor your calls, or cost you extra in hidden fees. 
‚Ä¢	Finds and removes adware and malware
Searches all files and apps quickly and effectively for malware or potentially unwanted programs such as screen lockers or adware, freeing your Android device from bloatware.


Why Malwarebytes? 
Imagine a world without malware. We do.
‚Ä¢	More than 4 million threats detected or blocked by Malwarebytes every day
‚Ä¢	More than 93 million scans by Malwarebytes every month
‚Ä¢	290,000+ installations of Malwarebytes technology every day

comments: It was amazing! I've been dealing with this problem where ads were popping up and it was taking me to Google when I wasn't even on Google. I tried to download Norton Malware but I had to pay, but then I downloaded this and it was completely free (except for the premium version). I scanned my apps and there was a hidden adware file. It really helped me out, so I advise you to download!

Paid for premium and within 24 hours I have an error popping up saying 'We've detected a problem with your premium, pleaee contact support'. Contacted support and they've not recognised what I'm trying to say is the problem, wasting money now really. Very upsetting because on all of my computers I'd never recommend anything but Malwarebytes.

Does not run all the time. Sometimes loads at startup sometimes not. No error message so you don't necessarily notice until you see the icon is not showing up in the status bar. This is not good for an AV product. I also run the Windows version with no issues. This is the only issue I have with the product.

This is the very best company and app in existance! Even on the free version these guys are absolutely awesome. I started using this years ago and my Microsoft account on my laptop and they never miss a Beat. The customer service is also excellent. But the app itself does not fail to find any and every problem I've ever had... I'm so glad I found them again!!ü¶â‚ô•Ô∏èüåû‚òÑ‚ö°üíöüíôüíúüí• P.S. I tried AVG, and also InCognito, none of them compare. These 2 above, while they are great apps no contest.

Installed due to pop up ads (no, I do not want to meet a hot milf tonight lol) and pleased so far. Used the free trial of the premium version to do a scan, it identified the malware and with a single click it was removed. My phone even seems to be running faster than it was before I noticed the issues. Overall, easy to use, very impressed and if it continues to impress I'd be more than happy to pay for the full version (which is also very reasonably priced, just over ¬£10 for an entire year!)

title: Cooking Diary¬Æ: Best Tasty Restaurant & Cafe Game
description:
Become the chef of your own restaurant in an exciting and FREE time management game! Cooking Diary is the best cooking game recognized by prestigious awards, loved and supported by MILLIONS OF PLAYERS around the world! Caution: this game can cause real culinary fever!

Welcome to Tasty Hills‚Äîa city where everyone loves to cook! It's your turn to keep a cooking diary. Help your grandpa save his family restaurant chain and build his reputation back up! Don't give your competitors a single chance to cook up evil plans, while you find true friends, manage restaurants and caf√©s, and cook top-quality dishes! Join fascinating events in the city's vibrant lifestyle, and gain fame as a great chef!

Features:
‚óè COOK hundreds of delicious recipes from around the world!
‚óè OPEN dozens of restaurants and caf√©s in all the districts of Tasty Hills and decorate them to your taste!
‚óè AMAZE the whole world by trying on ultra-stylish looks!
‚óè MAKE FRIENDS with cute and amazing pets of all kinds!
‚óè WIN in various culinary competitions with lots of prizes!
‚óè INTERACT with the residents of the city and immerse yourself in an exciting story!

üèÜ Winner of the WEBBY PEOPLE'S VOICE AWARD 2020 for Strategy/Simulation Game
üèÜ International Mobile Gaming Awards 2019 People's Choice Award winner

Play with your friends to cook and have fun together! Cooking Diary is a game that unites lovers of delicious and beautiful food from all over the world! Meet and chat with like-minded people‚Äîa love of cooking is a great starting point for a good friendship.

You can cook at restaurants and enjoy culinary adventures offline as well!

Tasty Hills is waiting for the grand opening of your restaurant! Etch your name in culinary history right now, Chef!

summary: Stranger Things is now in Tasty Hills!
developerAddress: Clementi Central Post Office, PO Box 041 Singapore 911202
recentChanges:
Our Stranger Things limited-time event has started!

SPECIAL EVENTS

‚Ä¢ Path to Glory: a pet Demogorgon and Steve Harrington as an assistant.

‚Ä¢ Scoops Ahoy restaurant: help the characters from the series save the Starcourt Mall!

‚Ä¢ Food Truck: take an amazing ride with Eleven and Max!

STRANGER THINGS ‚Ñ¢/¬© Netflix. 2020. Used with permission.
comments: The feedback by developers that "levels are balanced and can be completed without purchases" is bogus. That's like saying you can walk 20 miles to work if you don't have a car. Technically true, practically untenable. Unless you don't care about quickly progressing through levels and don't mind saving up measly 2-ruby daily rewards...skip this. It's an awesome game but without making constant in-app purchases, it's too frustrating to be worth anyone's time. Also the house/pet features are dumb.

It's fun but can get get frustratingly difficult. It's annoying how many gems you need to upgrade your restaurants later when you barely get any. I wish they would change it so you can buy the pet stuff with coins instead of gems, because I don't want to waste my precious gems on them. I know you can get pet stuff via challenges but it can be difficult.

I did so much progress in this game, unlocking new restaurants and having so much equipment and upgraded stuff, I don't remember when or why, but I uninstalled it, now I remembered it and I installed it again, as expected everything was gone, I just made a character and did the tutorial, afterwards, it showed my saves, and it showed that other save and I thought it would bring back all the progress I'd done but it didn't, I just want to know how to restore everything.

I love how there seems to be endless levels without in-app purchases. But... when I first started to play upgrading the interior of the restaurants cost way less bank notes. I don't want to spend hard earned gems on that. I'm saving those for the kitchen. Why did you guys jack up the prices of things? Plus the new house thing. The shear amount of gems I'd need to purchase ONE piece of furniture is rediculous!! So i pretty much ignore that feature. And why do in-app purch cost so much?

I honestly really enjoyed this game to begin with. It was fun, interesting and I really like the guild feature. But I've been playing for maybe a week or so and now it's asking me to pay rubies to upgrade things. I don't have a lot of rubies and I think it's really silly that that are so expensive! You don't earn nearly enough rubies to actually make it worth the wait. The entire game is centered around them and it's really not fun to play anymore as everything gets more expensive! :(

title: Strawberry Shortcake Ice Cream Island
description:
Budge Studios‚Ñ¢ welcomes you to Ice-Cream Island! Join Strawberry Shortcake‚Ñ¢ and her friends on a berrylicious adventure to restore the island to its former glory! Drive your very own ice cream truck and prepare delicious treats from snow cones to milkshakes to banana splits! Scoop, swirl, shake and mix fabulous flavors and terrific toppings for all your customers to enjoy! It‚Äôs time to bring back the sunshine!

recentChanges: Minor improvements. Thank you for playing Strawberry Shortcake Ice Cream Island
comments: This app was my favorite one at a time it was relaxing and makes me happy but now it is a very bad app . Coz till fifth level we sell ice creams in a motorcycle like thing but when we finish the fifth level it says that the road is rocky so we should pay an amount and get a big van to sell the ice cream. And if we look other characters shop and sell ice creams like blueberry muffins shop . They are closed we should complete all levels of the strawberry shortcake's shop and then get them .

My kids like the strawberry shortcake games and I am even happy to pay for the DLC which I did for this. Unfortunately its locked to my account so even though the kids share a tablet as they have their own accounts. I dont want to pay for everything twice so I'm not buying any more DLC.
It is fun...but you only get 4 levels for free which is pretty dissapointing. There are not many things for free.

The game is a 5 star but I gave it 3 Stars because you have to pay for the game and I cant complete it now sorry if you fix the game then I will give it 5 stars but until then it stays as a 3 star game sorry (just my opinion by the way)

It was a complete 5 star experience, simple and easy to learn building up sequences to fulfill the orders. The issue is without paying the game can not be completed, which is still ok as the effort of development deserves the money, but today we realized the already completed demo regions can not be played for free anymore... This was an awful experience, the price is fair but this action made it considerable to pay..

title: Clue: Period Tracker, Ovulation, Cycle & Pregnancy
description:
Clue is more than a period tracker ‚Äì it‚Äôs an accurate menstrual calendar, ovulation app, and pregnancy tracker that helps you take control of your reproductive health. It‚Äôs a scientific and fluff-free way to learn about your body and discover unique patterns in your menstrual cycle.  

With the Clue app, your periods, symptoms, fertility and pregnancy are all in one place. Great skin when you ovulate? Headaches during PMS? Learn about your personal patterns with 30+ tracking options from birth control pills to cramps, emotions, skin, moods, cervical fluid, and more. Plus, set reminders so you never get surprised by a period again. Clue is the period calendar, fertility tracker and pregnancy app that adapts to you and your unique cycle: the more you track, the more you learn, and the more you start to live in sync with your biology. 

** Top free period tracker app ‚Äì Obstetrics & Gynecology Journal (ACOG) **
** Best Fertility Apps 2020 ‚Äì Healthline **

CLUE PERIOD & OVULATION TRACKER TOP FEATURES:
¬∑ Period tracker, period calendar, ovulation tracker, and fertility tracker
¬∑ Accurate period predictions for upcoming cycles
¬∑ Log your symptoms, flow, moods and more and find patterns in your cycle
¬∑ Ovulation app to track ovulation tests and your BBT 
¬∑ Calendar reminders for upcoming periods, ovulation and PMS
¬∑ Predictions for your recurring symptoms, like cramps, pain, and headaches
¬∑ A period calendar with your menstruation, ovulation and fertile days
¬∑ Log and set birth control pill reminders
¬∑ A cycle analysis of your period lengths to observe trends and irregular cycles
¬∑ Menstrual health tips curated for you that explain your symptoms 

PERIOD TRACKER & MENSTRUAL CALENDAR 
¬∑ Period predictions, fertile day and ovulation estimates 
¬∑ A period diary to log your period days, flow intensity and the menstrual products you use
¬∑ Track symptoms, cravings, pain, exercise, and more to find patterns in your cycle
¬∑ Set up calendar reminders before your next period, ovulation, fertile window and PMS 

OVULATION TRACKER & FERTILITY TRACKER: 
¬∑ Ovulation calculator and basal body temperature tracker
¬∑ Fertility predictions and fertility friend to help you get pregnant if you‚Äôre trying to conceive
¬∑ Log ovulation test and cervical fluid for improved ovulation estimations
¬∑ Set fertility and ovulation calendar reminders to help plan a pregnancy

*NEW* PREGNANCY TRACKER & WEEK BY WEEK GUIDE
¬∑ Log into pregnancy mode to set your expected due date with a pregnancy calculator
¬∑ A pregnancy calendar and baby growth tracker to keep track of your trimester 
¬∑ Track pregnancy symptoms, baby movement, and more 
¬∑ Fact-checked health content to guide you through your pregnancy week by week so you know what to expect

FIND UNIQUE PATTERNS IN YOUR MENSTRUAL CYCLE
¬∑ View your period lengths and cycle variations
¬∑ See the symptoms you tracked in relation to your menstrual cycle
¬∑ Use Clue to help you manage your PCOS and irregular cycles
¬∑ Started menstruating? Clue is a helpful period tracker for teens
¬∑ Bring the Clue Period Tracker app to your OBGYN and have your period history available

Clue is a cycle tracker built for anyone who menstruates and uses gender-neutral language.

Note: Clue Period Tracker & Ovulation app should not be used as a contraceptive.

Helloclue.com ‚Äì Menstrual cycle encyclopedia and resource for  period, fertility, birth control, sex, and LGBTQIA topics. 

twitter.com/clue
facebook.com/helloclue
instagram.com/clueapp
tiktok.com/@clueapp
helloclue.com/hormonal

If you run into any trouble, the support team is here to help! Tap:
1. "More" menu 
2. Support
3. Choose the topic of your inquiry
Or, submit a request directly through this form: support.helloclue.com

summary: A helpful guide to your body: period tracker, menstrual calendar & pregnancy app
recentChanges:
Welcome to the world, pregnancy mode! Our most requested feature is finally here! Now, you can switch from period to pregnancy tracking by upgrading to Clue Plus.
- Log your pregnancy and set your due date in a new pregnancy calendar
- Track your baby‚Äôs growth week by week, and log your pregnancy and postpartum symptoms
- Receive science-backed insights on what to expect each week
- Access extensive in-app content to help you navigate through each trimester and postpartum
comments: I've been using Clue for a solid 5 years now, and I really like the app. I've only had issues with the new update. The app has been throwing me out sometimes when I press the "back" button. Also, whenever I try to reorder my tracking options to my taste, it doesn't register them and shifts them back to the original, unwanted order. I also don't like that the "track today's data" button on the centre of the cycle got removed. It was super convenient and I'd want it back. Otherwise love the app.

Please help! This app is amazing but it's starting to be weird!- Basically, it keeps tracking stuff on its own and it changes everything. It completely destroyed everything in my cycle! It made the period length from 5 days (which I am) to 1.5 days! And it keeps tracking to heavy bleeding etc when I'm not bleeding at all! I love this app so much and I really need it to work. Why does it do this? What can I do about it? Did someone possibly "hack" me without knowing and starting tracking?

Easy to use and unobtrusive experience. I haven't gotten enough cycles yet for symptom predictions, but just the act of tracking them has gotten me in better touch with what's going on. The app has useful information as well. I am not subscribed and just using the free version. I'll think about subscribing when I see how the experience is with predictions.

Edit: yes! The lock is 'fixed'! I now need to punch in my pin everytime I navigate to a different screen in the app instead of just once! Great work guys! /sarcasm. This app has gotten really pushy with trying to get you to pay to the point I want to uninstall. To top it off , the password lock is no longer functioning even though it's on in my settings.

Idk what they did to the app because after an update around september, it startes crashing when i tried to use certain features. I knew it wasnt my phone because many people complained about the same issue around the same time and I was hoping they'd fix it. Instead, the problem got progressively worse to the point where i get error messages telling me the app isn't working or that it needs to close when it's already supposedly closed. Years lost cause now I can't even get my data back. Trash.

title: Bake it
description:
Bake it is a fun and addictive game where you have to match what you are baking with the order.

It's time to perfect your bakes and wow your customers with your amazing skills! Use your mixture and toppings to create a masterpiece that matches up with what the customer desires.

Can you create the perfect bake?

Bake it features:
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Increasingly challenging bakes
- Colorful art

SUBSCRIBE TO BAKE IT
 
Subscribe to Bake It for all of the following benefits:

Slice Your Bakes
Exclusive Trays
Receive x2 Earnings
No Ads, which removes non-optional adverts from the game


SUBSCRIPTIONS INFORMATION:
 
Bake It VIP Membership access offers two membership options:

1) A weekly subscription costing $5.49 per week after a 3 day FREE trial period.

2) A monthly subscription costing $14.49 per month.

After buying this subscription, you will unlock; slice your bakes after baking so the top is even,exclusive trays to bake your goods in, x2 earnings for your in-game currency, and receive no ads, which removes non-optional ads from the game. This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your account after confirmation. The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will also be charged for renewal
The price notes are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may change and actual charges may be converted to local currency.
End of trial and subscription renewal:
- The payment is charged to your iTunes account after a confirmation of purchase
- The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the end of the current period
- The account will be charged for renewal 24 hours before the end of the current period at the standard cost of the weekly subscription
- The user may manage the subscription and auto-renewal by accessing the user's account settings after purchase in the store
- No cancellation of the current subscription is permitted during the active subscription period
- Any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when the subscription is purchased

title: Stomach Pain (Guide)
description:
Stomach aches, also broadly called ‚Äúabdominal pain,‚Äù are tricky things to find remedies for unless you know the cause. Ranging from indigestion and irritable bowel syndrome to gastritis and GERD, an aching tummy can stem from many things. Assuming you are dealing with an uncomplicated stomach ache, these remedies can help bring relief from the pain and discomfort that‚Äôs making you miserable.
this app gives you the causes and natural solutions for that pain

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improved performance.
comments: It's fun in the beginning, but gets boring pretty quickly. All the courses seem to be randomly generated, but only between the few different obstacles, so everything is repetitive. The different "courses" you unlock after winning a select number of races seem to only change the color of the road and nothing else. The speed boost that you can achieve is pretty useless since the other racers (cpu) just get telwportef down the map with you. The bonus jump at the end is nice, though.

Well the game is fun, for some time. Unfortunately it becames repetitive and have some problems. First that when you gain boost you fly really fast but the other "players" teleport to you so the boost is useless, then some boost pads on the floor make you go slower for no reason, and then when I was going to rate the game with 3 stars I was redirected to the email so I am giving 2 stars. Overall fun game but gets boring fast.

It's a great game, especially when I'm bored. The only problem is that I've bought all the skins (whatever you call them) for my avatar. I want to have more skins to buy since my virtual coins (that I earned by playing) are over 100k already. It's still very fun though.

In a world of "play to win money" and clan style games its nice to have a simple, one goal game and I have never seen a game like this. It has good graphics, good controls and ita simple but addictive.

This game is alright I have a few problems why when I try to turn in a ball thing I fly off the track and why when I use bost pad I go slow pls fix that and when I speed the BOTs teleport to me and it said I had to reset the game DID YOU KNOW I HAD EVERY THING

title: IBDonPLAY
description:
IBDonPLAY brengt u op korte en krachtige manier op de hoogte van interessante wetenswaardigheden op het gebied van IBD. Iedere 2 weken krijgt u een update van een IBD vraagstuk via een 1 minuut durende animatie, samengesteld door collega-experts op het gebied van IBD.

IBDonPLAY is alleen bedoeld voor MDL-artsen met of zonder IBD specialisatie, MDL-artsen in opleiding, Verpleegkundig Specialisten en Phycisian Assistants met IBD specialisatie. 

De content wordt bepaald door een redactieraad en is op basis van de richtlijnen. Ferring, die IBDonPLAY financieel mogelijk heeft gemaakt, is niet betrokken bij de totstandkoming van de content.

Wanneer er een nieuwe video verschijnt ontvangt u een notificatie. 

Via de app kunt u zelf een vraag indienen die u beantwoord wilt zien in de vorm van een animatie.

title: Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath - Hospital Drama
description:
Become a doctor in a romantic medical drama with aspiring intern Allison Heart!

GameHouse and Blue Giraffe proudly present the latest GameHouse Original Story, starring your favorite doctor, Allison Heart! 
Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath is an intense medical drama tied to a casual game that‚Äôll move you to tears. The game has a gripping and unique storyline, original singer/songwriter music, highly detailed artwork and animation, cool addictive gameplay and an insane amount of heart. If you enjoy games that focus on great storytelling, this game is for you!

‚ù§Ô∏è Experience the life of a doctor as you rush to find a cure for an unknown disease!
‚ù§Ô∏è Your search for a cure will take you through six exciting new hospital wards, from the Clinic to the Morgue.
‚ù§Ô∏è Play the full game with no extra charges, thanks to our free-to-play model. 
‚ù§Ô∏è  More levels to play than ever before! Enjoy 240 levels at launch, with more to come!
‚ù§Ô∏è So many extras! Unlock new story scenes, level up your character to earn helpful bonuses, and purchase the upgrades YOU want to buy
‚ù§Ô∏è  Party with Oliver and his guinea pig friends, Punky and Olive.
‚ù§Ô∏è Master new mini-games like a true doctor, all in medical style.
‚ù§Ô∏è Additional levels will be added in the future, giving you even MORE of the game you love!


Follow Allison as she begins her last rotations as an intern at Queensburrow Bridge Hospital, on her path to graduating as a fully-fledged doctor! Unfortunately, things never go smoothly for Allison, and this is no exception. Dr. Ermey, the lead physician during her clinic rotation, seems to have it in for her, and threatens to fail her. Allison ends up watching her chances of becoming a doctor shrink by the minute, desperately searching for a solution, but unable to find one.
However, everything gets put on hold when a patient with a mysterious disease is admitted to the hospital. Several doctors end up becoming infected themselves, including Connor, Sophia‚Ä¶ and Dr. Ermey. When the CDC quarantines Queensburrow, it‚Äôs a race against time for Allison and the other doctors to find a cure before more deaths occur. 
Your assistance will be invaluable to Allison as she tries to beat the clock and find a cure in time! Experience love, intense action, realistic drama, crazy funny moments and the beauty of celebrating life in Heart‚Äôs Medicine ‚Äì Doctor‚Äôs Oath.

Follow Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

Follow GameHouse on Facebook:: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

comments: I absolutely love this game it gives you back story, intrigue, and a real interest in the characters. I absolutely love it!!! I just wish there was a way to get energy either from friends or from watching ads more because I hate waiting until my energy fills up again maybe they can work that in some how but honestly I have no issues with the game it's GREAT üëçüëçüëçüëç

Love this game series I am subscriber. I don't mind the in app purchases I've made a few. My problem is the special events, I have the same problem with them all. Currently with the Halloween I have gotten to chest number 8 and am no longer getting credit for the skulls I've earned. So I can never finish an event. I stopped playing for awhile because of this issue and the fact that I can't get support in the game to work either. I haven't gotten credit for the skulls in the last 3 levels

The only thing I'm complaining about is that it has a few bugs. When I just played I had a level with Ryan and a mobile clinic with tray decay and limited tray space. comments: Update: I was able to refresh the license through the Play Store settings. After uninstalling on my old phone it will not let me use the "pro" version on my new phone. The subscription renewed last May for the year, but constantly tries to get me to upgrade and pay again from with the app. It's stupid that I can't download a "pro" version from the app store, and forced to pay again from within the app. Very deceptive.

Cant get the app to work Edit: Cant get the app to work. When I click "Analyze" it takes me back to "Home Screen". I click de app again, I get a message that says "App keeps closing". Below that there are two options. 1. App info. 2. Close app. And that`s it. I have this app in another Android tablet and works fine. But it won't work on this new Galaxy tab S5e Android tablet.
It does great things for the performance of the phone. In my opinion it doesn't need to look flashy, isn't that defeating the purpose of lowering ram usage, lol.

Down loaded it. Opened it. Get a prompt asking me to turn a switch on. I would if I had the faintest idea how to access/find the switch. No link, no instructions and after trying to activate every potential icon I still don't get any further forward. Another example of a program relying on people already knowing how to work it. But for me, just a waste of memory space. I get faster and better results from just rebooting.

I use to use CCleaner years ago when I was in the computer repair field. When I found out CCleaner was available on Android naturally I was intrigued. After using it for well over a month I found CCleaner to be utterly useless. #1. It doesn't do anything my phone doesn't already do. #2. The many different notifications are extremely annoying and unnecessary. #3. My last straw was the 4 week report that is supposed to show you your least used apps. Low and behold it was drastically off.

title: Deepstash - Self Improvement, Motivation & Care
description:
Think of Deepstash as your personal library of thoughts and knowledge. A daily source of inspiring & life changing stories and ideas. Read articles, learn skills, get productivity tips and discover life hacks. All curated by our team and presented to you in a simple, practical and easy to remember, short summarized format. Fuel your curiosity and get smarter daily.

It's like your social media feed, if your social media feed had things that mattered :-)

Content & articles that matter to you. Our team curates the best stories around the web (articles, videos, podcasts & more, from top publications and magazines like Medium, Inc, Lifehacker, Forbes, Mark Manson, FastCompany, BBC, Tony Robbins & more) and provides actionable and inspiring short form key insights to improve yourself personally and professionally. A wealth of self help knowledge in your pocket.

Have questions? You‚Äôll surely get answers by reading, learning and exploring a world of hard and soft skills as well as interests like time management, self improvement, leadership, self-confidence, motivation or psychology, that will make you a great fit anywhere in life you put your mind to.

Summarized ideas. You need just 5 minutes per day. Our team works for you. We provide a summary of the main insights of articles and other web content in a short and crisp 100 words or less format we call ‚Äúideas‚Äù.

Escape the negativity and time wasting pull of social media platforms. Our app‚Äôs goal is to help you towards self improvement and self care and to get you motivated, inspired, wiser and productive.

Personalized content & feed. Choose a few topics of interest (like self improvement, time management, problem solving, love & relationships & more) and then just use the app at your leisure. As you save ideas and use our app, we learn what you like and find the best stories and articles to show you every day, so you‚Äôre motivated and inspired. You don‚Äôt even have to work for it.

The more you save ideas the better we learn what articles and topics you love. We refresh your recommendations multiple times a day so you never run out of fresh stories and ideas.

Build and organize your knowledge. You can save ideas in your own personal profile and build your own hub of facts, skills, quotes, information and ideas that matter to you.

Share your knowledge. We make it super easy for you to share the best articles, quotes, stories and ideas on any channel you want. Send it to a friend on Whatsapp or share it with your followers on Instagram.

No ads. No distractions. 100% Free. The Deepstash app is free and open to everyone. And we‚Äôll never sell, lease or share your data. Your privacy is really important to us.

descriptionHTML:

Read articles, learn skills, get productivity tips and discover life hacks. All curated by our team and presented to you in a simple, practical and easy to remember, short summarized format. Fuel your curiosity and get smarter daily.

It's like your social media feed, if your social media feed had things that mattered :-)

Content & articles that matter to you. Our team curates the best stories around the web (articles, videos, podcasts & more, from top publications and magazines like Medium, Inc, Lifehacker, Forbes, Mark Manson, FastCompany, BBC, Tony Robbins & more) and provides actionable and inspiring short form key insights to improve yourself personally and professionally. A wealth of self help knowledge in your pocket.

Have questions? You‚Äôll surely get answers by reading, learning and exploring a world of hard and soft skills as well as interests like time management, self improvement, leadership, self-confidence, motivation or psychology, that will make you a great fit anywhere in life you put your mind to.

Escape the negativity and time wasting pull of social media platforms. Our app‚Äôs goal is to help you towards self improvement and self care and to get you motivated, inspired, wiser and productive.

comments: Loved the app. I can see the articles in this app slowly impacting my daily routine. It's keeping me motivated. It's helping me learn things. I feel like reading a good book after just a small article. Thing to improve: it suggests me a good article in the notification and when I click it nothing happens. The notification just disappears.

This is an amazing app!!!!I am writing my review after one month of using it and the app gives me some inspirational ideas and strategies to make my lifestyle better in a progressive manner.However, I am giving 4 stars because of the bugs.When I open the app,it freezes for a few minutes and works.I hope it can be rectified on upcoming updates. EDIT : Thanks for the response from the team! It just works fine now . Reinstall fixed the bugs. I already had the latest 4.3.0 and it had bugs somehow..

Instead of swiping to read the next article, may I suggest putting an icon that we can tap on to go to the next article instead of swiping? when scrolling on the current article that I'm reading, I accidentally scroll too far to the left/right and it goes to the next article and when I go back, it didn't even refresh to where I left off! I love this app, I prefer it more than social media, but it's so annoying when I accidentally swipe on the next article and have to go back & scroll down again!

In a world that seems to be a raging dumpster fire, and everything in social media and news pointing to how bad things are getting... This app is a breath of fresh air. It offers simple, memorable morsels of wisdom. Easily consumable. It is so important to focus on what we can control---ourselves. Working on bettering ourselves, our mindsets, and expanding our horizons is the way we change the world. I am adding this app to my home screen and making a commitment to read articles daily. Great app

This is just so worth it. If I were to recommend something that is worth accessing, well this is pretty much on my top list of reads. I'm loving this, the settings, the articles in it and the concepts of developing such an app was so just so impressive. Hats off to the developers and creators.

title: Children's doctor : dentist.
description:
Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist.¬†
We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic).¬†
In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets.
¬†
You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. After all, they all just need your help. For her, the animals will be grateful to you and very grateful.
¬†
Developing games for children, such as a veterinarian, contribute to the overall development of your child. They help to develop fine motor skills, coordination of movements, visual perception, attentiveness and observation, will show the baby how to treat animals, take care of them.
¬†
Our games for kids, such as a dentist, will teach them not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth, do not forget to clean them several times a day, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant pastime.
¬†
For the purpose of comprehensive development of the child, we create applications and educational games for children that are aimed to help boys and girls develop basic motor and other skills, and also have fun, fun and useful to spend their free time.
¬†
All you need is to download games, install and start playing, and in the future your child can choose one of the most needed professions in the world - the dentist
¬†
Be sure to visit our http://yovogames.com and also we are at:
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZruadkJJTuD4Bgb1F6pa3A
Twitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudio
Facebook: https://facebook.com/yovogames

comments: It's great for toddlers! But hey, parents, please PLEASE monitor you kid while playing this game. Ads pop up and they easily could tap on them. They range from insurance, to mattresses all the way to other games. So please, monitor your child! But everything else aside, the game is great. It's repetitive, but kids like that.

I initially thought this app would not benefit my toddler in any way, plus I was a bit bothered overall. The thing is, I wasn't paying attention & pre-judged, I was wrong. As I sat with her & watched her smiling ... I decided to join in & her concentration mixed with true laughter is all I could have asked for ! THANK YOU BY KEEPING IT SILLY FOR HER WHILE STILL PROVIDING AN HONEST LEARNING EXPERIENCE SHE'LL BENEFIT FROM !

Get rid of ads, please. Ads arent appropriate for toddlers. This is a great game, and my toddler can't play it without getting inappropriate ads or being prompted to download things. Such a shame, as she loves it.

The ad scrolling at the bottom on the screen is horrible. Every 10 seconds my 3 year old was accidently tapping it which sent it right into a full ad. She spent most of the time crying because it kept happening.
It would be more fun if there was more than 3 patients and different things to do but it is a great game also the advertisements every 10 seconds can stop anytime now that's very irritating

title: Merge Tower Bots
description:
‚òÖ The HOTTEST merge game of 2019! ‚òÖ

Evil enemies are invading your land! Can you merge and build your robot army to protect it fast enough?

Get Merging to Protect Your Land! 
Merge Tower Bots is the most EPIC merge idle clicker game out there! Combining addicting merge and clicker gameplay with exciting idle game features, Merge Tower Bots will have your merging robots and defeating enemies of hours!

4 explosive experiences in 1!
üí• MERGE ‚Äì Merge robots of the same level to power them up, grow your army, and strengthen your arsenal!
üí• IDLE ‚Äì Collect coins as your robots shoot down enemies, even while your offline! Use coins to buy more robot soldiers to merge and upgrades to power them up.
üí• TOWER DEFENSE ‚Äì Strategically place robots around your city to defend it against enemies and bosses. They‚Äôre coming fast, so merge and place them quickly!
üí• CLICKER ‚Äì Fast, easy, and addicting gameplay make this a classic clicker merge game like you‚Äôve never played before!

More Fun features:
üí• Dozens of robots to unlock and unleash!
üí• Awesome powerups from earnings multipliers, fire rate multipliers, and more!
üí• Advance to defend a new city every time you defeat a boss!
üí• Double your idle offline earnings every time you play!

The world is under attack. It‚Äôs up to you and your robot army to defend it! 
Merge, build, defend, and become the most powerful force in the world!

People dont play games like this for long when forced ads and actually ads that give benefits exist all at the same time, you could've had much more ad viewability if you just kept the ads that give benifits when clicked on... you should know this by now.

title: JEFIT Workout Tracker, Weight Lifting, Gym Log App
description:
Tracking workout training routines using JEFIT gym log is easy. Programs from bodybuilding, 3 day splits, 5x5 & strength plans to home exercises & body weight lifting.

‚òÖ Google Play Editor's Choice ‚òÖ Men‚Äôs Fitness - Best Fitness and Health Apps ‚òÖ USA Today - New year, new you

recentChanges:
- Bug fix for the save quick workout popup
- Halloween themed workout summary
- Tutorials for new features
- Various UI improvements
- Fix exercise logs showing empty names
- Improved Discover feed
- Bug fixes
- Improved body stats page
- Improved body stats and workout summary newsfeeds
- Add audio cue on/off toggle to the settings page

comments: Used this apps for a couple of years and the latest updates are a backward step. The UI no longer displays the interval time but been replaced with an incremental number for those who can't count sets. I use to enter the weight for my next set during the interval however the keyboard won't appear while the interval timer is on. Also none of the graphics for the exercises display anymore which has caused me confusion. I hope the latest updates are reconsidered

Been using this app since the early days. I love the ongoing support but it wouldnt hurt for devs to stick to one UI and stop moving things around every other update. The latest update to intervals is just lazy. The timer auto-starts even if you dont want/need it and is always logged. A better approach would be to disable the time+logging if interval is set to 0, otherwise there is a x second delay before timer starts. Also the ability to set the main page under excerise history would be great.

Nice app an community. There must be a bug with the points earned: with the latest versions my sessions are not counted anylonger (and I do train every day almost...) Would be nice to get it resolved (I am in the contest, and it gives motivation ;) Overall, is a very good develooment, kudos to the team.

It's a good app, but it can be hard to use. I also couldn't find a way to contact them from the app and I feel like if you're going to charge people money you have to put a way to contact you if they have a problem or question. My husband just wants to know if there is a weekly report for reps like the other stats, but it makes me nervous that if something goes wrong I can't find a way to contact them about it.

Great app!!! Have been using for years. Really enjoy the improvements made over the years. Unfortunately, body stats page/functions have been very buggy and don't even work the last few updates. Weight doesn't record. Graph has goal weight posted way off in future. Weight no longer sync's w Google Fit. Could be 5star app. -2stars until fixed.

title: Nonstop Knight - Offline Idle RPG Clicker
description:
Nonstop Knight ‚Äì Offline Idle RPG Clicker is a fantastic roleplaying game with both action and offline idle RPG game elements. The never-ending action RPG Nonstop Knight is full of adventure while crawling through the dungeon quest. Download now for free and cherish this striking idle RPG game. 

Idle with heroes in nonstop adventures, quest for epic loot, test your skills and survive hordes of enemies in endless dungeon crawler. Tackle the offline idle rpg adventure while your hero earns rewards and loots even while you're taking a break. Play actively whenever you like, fight in short sessions in your coffee break or engage in longer sessions if you wish. The best is that you progress even when you are afk or offline and keep collecting gold in this dungeon quest: Play this amazing RPG offline!

Play Nonstop Knight ‚Äì Offline Idle RPG game For Free! 
Nonstop Knight, the action RPG is fun, simple and playable with just one thumb. Become the tap titan by proving your button smashing skills: Whirl, slam, slash or leap, dungeon quest, whatever suits your playing style - smashing four buttons is all you need!
Increase your strength, quest for epic loot and legendary items such as The Beast armor that increases your critical hit chance, gives you more armor after getting hit and grants attack speed. Best combined with The Emperor cloak that gives you a dodge chance and heals you to full health when enemy swords hit you. Healer items, AOE, Hits, Dots, and Crits make Nonstop Knight the full RPG experience on mobile. Charge with your warrior, cleave multiple enemies, whirlwind hordes around you in raids, loot and slam bosses in epic dungeon quest crawler.

Features of Nonstop Knight - Idle RPG:
- Smash enemies, beat bosses, earn gold and loot with your clicker hero!
- Loot and upgrade your idle knight to battle the dungeon crawler better in this action offline RPG!
- Collect pets in this pet collector idle RPG game. Have the full collection of epic pets to help you in the dungeon quest!
- Discover new abilities for your hero to unleash epic action skills in battle. Your idle RPG experience will never be better!
- Climb the dungeon crawler leaderboard - rewards and loot await! The most action your idle knight will ever see!
- Dungeon crawler now equipped with events and boss hunts! Hunt bosses with friends and free pets! Get even more loot and other epic pet rewards!
- Idle stress-free offline gameplay - A hero dungeon quest RPG ideal for playing on the go. 
- No Internet connection required. Best offline action RPG out there! Play now and be a real offline clicker hero!
- Swipe, click, tap now and quest for epic loot in this clicker RPG!
- Idle hero games are awesome! Quest for epic loot, explore like a dungeon crawler and upgrade endlessly! 
- Nonstop fun, nonstop RPG, your nonstop knight awaits!

By accessing or using a flaregames product, you're agreeing to our Terms of Service (www.flaregames.com/terms-service/).
- Like the Nonstop Knight on Facebook: facebook.com/nonstopknight
- Follow the Nonstop Knight on Twitter: twitter.com/nonstopknight
- http://nonstopknight.com/

Nonstop Knight is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use these features, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings. According to our Terms of Service, Nonstop Knight is allowed for download and play only for persons 16 years or more of age, or with explicit parental consent. You can read more here: http://www.flaregames.com/parents-guide/.
