recentChanges: Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.
comments: It's a fun, clicker game also great to pass the time. It's not a complex super story based action rpg game. However its simple and rather fun. If you need to pass a large amount of time. I would suggest this game definitely to a friend. Who not looking for anything fo complex story or super high open world multiplayer type game.

Very nice game 5 stars. Still a decent amount of people who play boss hunt. Easy to pass time and play offline if you wish. Developers listen to help make the game better for player experience. Plays smoothly. The ads to get extra items such as cash or tokens or even gems helps you progress through the game a lot faster. Well done with that keep it up

It's a shame really. I love this game, but you spend more time watching adds than playing. I've left the game a few times and come back hopeful it had gotten better. Nope, worse if anything. Not sure it's even really been updated in a long time either. Plus the timing on your taps are strange at times.

My Knight hasn't stopped for 4-5 Years. Bought a new phone. Just reloaded the game. Trillions in bonuses to unlock. Nice. Nice to watch. You equip him with Swords n fancy weapons. You control the buffs in the fight. Lazy way to play, but still good entertainment.
Guess you could say the gameplay is so fun (& offline) it gets addicting... least it does for me.. Not a lot of hype to buy stuff either, so naturally = 5 stars!!!

comments: The app is easy to use and intuitive, the assistants are very cute and the free version of the app is super ok. This app really helped me with drinking more water.
Encourages you to drink more which in turn helps in weight loss especially if you are already dieting or following an eating plan. All drinks can be logged including hot drinks.
Love it even with the free version üòÉ I dont personally see many ads so that's a plus for sure. It definitely helps to keep me motivated to drink water more often an stay on track

I thought the app was awesome when I first got it and was more than happy to pay to unlock extra features. Now I've come back to using it after a break and found that despite paying for the additional features I now no longer have them and have to wait to unlock them. Cool app, but if I pay for a feature I should keep it, even if you update the way the app works.
App was nice until they've changed the subscription to a monthly one. I've previously paid for the full version only to have it revoked with their new subscription system.

title: Poop Record-Control Metabolism
description:
By recording the daily toilet time, according to the metabolism to detect your health.
Ever wondered what your bowel movements mean and how they affect your health?
Want to know how often you have bowel diseases like constipation, diarrhea or bloody stools? Then tracking your bowel movements now is easier than ever.

Track and analyze these statistics to understand the consistency, color, frequency, and urgency of your health, and then use the data to determine if there are any problems, such as IBS or Crohn's disease.

comments: I like this game alot! Its very fun to make vlogs and other stuff. I got this app a couple days ago and I already am starting to love it! There is an issue with the ads but that doesn't really bother me alot I don't find it a problem.. you can create vlogs, dress your avatar up, make vlogs, and more! Other than the ads this game is amazing. The way that you can comment on peoples vlogs/videos is AMAZING! Its really fun how you get 10,000 subs in one day. I hope the future updates are good too!

I love this game! Its amazing and has so many things that are cool! One thing that would be better is maybe if u could comment on other peoples videos just like in real life!! Other thann that there is a really good game that every one should install as soon as possible! Make sure that u dont have ads though because there are a lot of them! Makers if your reading this please cut back on all the ads they are kinda annoying and ridiculous how many there are! But overall its a really AMAZING game!!

I love this game! I would give it 5 stars but there is a lot of tapping and the more videos you make the longer it lakes to make them. I wish you could comment on other people's videos and comments. You should make it so you can interact with different objects like the swimming pool and basketball hoop and maybe even control what you are doing in the videos. Like you say your going to do sports as the topic and then you try and shoot hoops for the video. I do recommend this game, it's fun!

Amazing game! I love playing it. I would recommend it, has fun rewards, you can watch a stream, etc. But one thing that bugs me is when I got more then 5,000 subscribers, the box thing didn't unlock. Please fix it and I will get a 5 star rating for you.

It's a pretty fun game I've been looking for something like this for a while. The reason for three stars is bc to post a video all you do is just pick a topic and done. Like you can only TALK about something not like do a challenge. I wanted to do a WoF video but you can't do that.

title: Trading 212 - Stocks, ETFs, Forex, Gold
description:
UK's #1 app for active trading & long-term investing.*
Access the global financial markets commission-free and hassle-free.
Start with a free, lifetime practice account with virtual money.
Capital at risk.

Authorised and regulated by the FCA (UK).

Trading 212 Invest & ISA:

- Totally free and unlimited - no commission, no fees
- 3000+ Real Stocks and ETFs from the UK, the US, Germany, France, Spain and the Netherlands
- Uncompromising, direct trade execution on the stock exchanges - we don‚Äôt sell your order flow

Trading 212 CFD:

- 2400+ CFDs on Stocks, Forex, Gold, Oil, Indices and more
- CFDs on Cryptocurrencies available 24/7 - Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple and more
- Tight spreads even at news time
- Smooth and easy to use charts for technical analysis

...and always an outstanding live customer service, responding within seconds.


* Based on store statistics.

Investments can fall and rise. You may get back less than you invested. Past performance is no guarantee of future results. CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 76% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.


Trading 212 is offered by the following companies:

Trading 212 UK Ltd. authorised and regulated by the FCA (Register number 609146).
Trading 212 Ltd. authorised and regulated by the FSC, Bulgaria (Register number RG-03-0237).

comments: Absolutely amazing! I've been looking for an app like this for years. Did some research: the company is solid and secure. They actually charge no fees on the "Invest" account. Beware of "CFD" account, if you don't know how it works it's easy to lose money. Depositing was instant and withdraw took about 3 hours. The app is simple and complete. Use this promo code before your first deposit (in the app settings, Invest account) and you'll get a real free stock share in 3 working days: GvFjLLHy

One of the best apps for trading but I find Stocks & etfs to be limited, its quite annoying as I love the app, easy to use & reliable but when doing a search & not being able to find some well known & opular stocks/etfs that can be easily found in other apps makes the experience frustrating as I can't keep growing my portfolio & also more historical data for the stocks is needed as it seems to only show you until it was added to T212 for the first time? Will change to 5‚òÜ when this improves.üëç

After a bit of practice this app is very intuitive and easy to use. Quite addictive but some care is needed esp when doing CFD's. Care also to avoid getting carried away buying and trading. Lots of options available and moving/withdrawing funds is very easy. All in all a great app. and to be recommended if you have an interest in stocks, shares etc.

Generally, excellent. It's currently the only decent app I've used for trading within an ISA. It's very easy to use, you can get money in and out pretty quickly, the technical indicators are good and their support is very responsive. Only reason for not giving 5 stars is that the automatic trading triggers are a little dumb and there's no pre or after market trading but these are only an issue for more advanced users.

This app is a perfect start for people new to investing. It has a nice ui combined with a practise mode for those uneasy about investing during the current economic crisis. Ive used it ever since i realised turning a profit on fake money in video games was enjoyable and applying it to real life its a thrilling gamble (investment) ease of access, guides, and multiple optuons for methods of investing.
